repository.corpname: Washington State University Libraries, Manuscripts, Archives and Special Collections

did.unittitle: Preliminary Guide to the Washington State University Foundation Records
did.abstract: Correspondence of the WSU Foundation from 1986-1988. Includes correspondence with organizations, alumni, and employee correspondence files.

bioghist.p: The WSU Foundation was established in 1979 for the sole purpose of promoting and raising financial support for WSU and its programs. The WSU Foundation is still around as of 2021 and has raised $1.7 billion to that date to support WSU since its conception.

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of WSU Foundation records from 1986-1988. It includes correspondence with outside organizations and alumni, individual employee correspondence with alumni, and details on Foundation events.

arrangement.p: This is an unprocessed collection. Any arrangement reflects either a pre-existing order from the records' creators or previous custodians, or preliminary sorting performed by staff.
Materials are ordered chronologically by date. Box 1: April 1987-July 1987. Box 2: July 1986- November 1986. Box 3: December 1986- April 1987. Box 4: September 1987- December 1987.

accessrestrict.p: This collection is open and available for research use.

prefercite.p: Preliminary Guide to the Washington State University Foundation Records, 1986-1988 (UA1990-38)
Manuscripts, Archives, and Special Collections, Washington State University Libraries, Pullman, WA.

acqinfo.p: This material was transferred to WSU Libraries' MASC by Georgia Kersh of the WSU Foundation on January 2nd, 1991 and retained as UA1990-38.

controlaccess.p: This collection is indexed under the following headings in the online catalog. Researchers desiring materials about related topics, persons, or places should search the catalog using these headings.

controlaccess.corpname: Washington State University. Foundation -- Records and correspondence
